note:
How does this work? Been a long time since I moved to a new social platform. Let's see...

40+ year old non binary living it up with my Lovely Lady. Small scale ethical snake breeder. Posts will be a mixed bag of political, my snakes, and whatever else catches my fancy around here.

fields.name: MeerkatMorphs
fields.value: We've been breeding and raising snakes for several years now. We believe in ethical practices and producing healthy pets. Specialized in corn snakes we are also hoping to breed sand boas in the next couple of years. Feel free to ask us here or email us ab
